title: Bilateral Transaction
description: A direct contract between a seller and buyer outside of a centralized market.

sections.title: Definition by FERC
sections.body_md: > A direct contract between a seller and buyer outside of a centralized market or exchange (e.g. Nymex or an RTO/ISO). In energy markets, the buyer or seller usually finds his or her matching counter-party through a broker (e.g. voice brokers, ICE, etc.).
